column5: Hows it going guys......... I am new to the area and am looking to get together with some goose/duck hunters in KW. I have a working lab and have only hunted birds for about 2 years. I have not been able to find a good website for bird hunters like here @ OFC. If anyone knows of a similar web site please let me know. Thanks all    email [emailÂ protected]
Hi ,  You can try these 2 sites  http://www.canadianhuntingdogs.com/forums/  AND  http://forums.huntontario.com/forum.jspa?forumID=1
